recipes.php5::default: Performs the installation of php5, pear, the php5 module for apache, and the smarty template library.  Additional modules can be specified at runtime

php5/module_list.description: A list of PHP5 modules to install, separated by spaces. Only supply the module name appearing after php5-.  For instance if you wanted php5-mysql and php5-imap installed, this list should be set to "mysql imap".  To view a full list of available php5 modules see the Ubuntu package page http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?searchon=names&keywords=php5-
